features: STANDARD SIZE: Sold per single panel, measures: 100 inch width by 108 inch length. Each panel has 16 antique copper grommets (rim of grommet is 2.4", while inner is 1.6"), can be hung from a basic or decorative curtain rod

ELEGANT BURLAP QUALITY: This classic wide curtain passed GLOBAL RECYCLED STANDARD certificate, made of rich faux linen fabric with natural blackout features, thick and heavy duty make the draperies more durable and long lasting, burlap effect will bring more vintage and graceful look to your window and room

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS: This extra wider panel can block out sunlight to control the light and balance the temperature in your rooms, high performance on thermal insulated, room darkening, energy efficient, noise reducing and privacy protecting

UNIQUE HOME DECOR: Vogue home fashion colors (pure white, ivory, teal blue, beige, charcoal gray, taupe gray, tan, prairie sand, brown) are available, great choice for bedroom, living room, patio door, sliding door, room divider, TV room and any large other windows
EASY CARE: Machine washable in cold water, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry low and warm iron as needed

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: H.VERSAILTEX is one of the suppliers of home textiles and ready-made curtains draperies by delivering high fashion designs, patterns, various textures, and colors in an "affordable luxury" quality that meet up today's consumers expects, let H.VERSAILTEX window coverings be the anchor of each room in your home!

A Solid-Hued Design That Brings Subtle Shimmer to Any Space in Your Home These faux linen textured rich panels drape beautifully with blackout insulation provided by Light Blocking and Thermal innovated technology Block 85% of light, prevent harmful UV rays from reaching your floors and furniture, efficiently prevents cold or heat transfer from outside The panel will increase energy efficiency of your home, provide unparalleled privacy, and allow you to create darkness at any time of day Slip a rod through its grommets and adorn a dining room window with this panel to bring understated style to your entertainment ensemble This natural look curtain can be washed in the machine using cold water and on a gentle cycle, tumble dried on a low setting. No bleached

Widely Used Perfect for patio door / window, sliding door, room divider, bedroom, living room and TV room for a better fun, well matching for your home, business offices, apartments Build on the traditional style with these multiple sizes linen curtain panels: 52"W x 63"L / 52"W x 84"L / 52"W x 96"L / 52"W x 108"L / 100"W x 84"L / 100"W x 96"L / 100"W x 108"L Chic colors are available: Tan, Cocoa Brown, Pure White, Taupe Gray, Taupe, Aegean Blue, Charcoal Gray, Beige, Ivory, Burgundy, Mauve, Navy and more new coming

BLACKOUT & THERMAL This solid blackout thermal grommet single curtain panel is woven in three layers, using a tight weave of colored yarns on the front and back Sandwiched around an inner layer of black yarns creating the panel is excellent for blocking out harsh outside light while providing privacy Perfect for preventing a glare from the sun from interfering with a family movie night or for helping you sleep in weekends

SOPHISTICATED CRAFTSMANSHIP The careful stitchings are against loose threads and wrinkle hems Constructed with head height: 4", bottom hem: 2" for decent quality home lifecomplete your window setting at your home, business offices, apartments and more GREAT & NATURAL LOOK Crafted from soft, comfortable and supple man-made fibers, burlap effectThis faux linen single curtain has lots of interesting texture elements can add to a room Bold and attractive, this lovely curtain panels showcase an casual and classic look VINTAGE GROMMET This vintage drapery is constructed with antique copper grommetsEasy for installation, fitted the curtain rods up to 1 1/4 diameterSet the foundation for an enchanting ensemble with this timeless linen curtain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: MY wife wanted me to replace the window covering in her hobby room. I used these curtains to do that with a new KAMANINA rod from Amazon. They were excellent. Full black out and very easy to open and close, even though they are 108" drop. My wife was so pleased with them that she has me put the exact same curtains and rods (different sizes) in the breakfast room, then the family room and then the front lounge. See was very pleased with it all - a big improvement that looks absolutely great. And I was pleased with the excellent value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best curtains in the h.versailtex line!
reviews.reviewText: This company/brand sells many different types of curtains. I know because I spent way too much time down a curtain rabbit hole and ordered several different ones. These are hands down the best!They’re not expensive, but they look like they are. really solid and well made. I bought the white ones, and they are a very clean bright white. They also have a nice wide hem at the bottom which cheap curtains do not. They’re also soft, which I like.Each panel arrives folded in a clear plastic sealed bag. Obviously there were some wrinkles along the fold lines, but the rest of the curtain is wrinkle free. I hung them and the wrinkles softened after several hours, and I’m confident I can get what’s left out with an iron.As far as blackout feature, I’d say they block 70%. If you want full blackout, their faux linen line, which I also tried, is 100% blackout. Those curtains are thicker and not soft, but they still look nice and def do the job.I highly recommend these curtains. I bought 5 different sets of curtains before I found these. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are really Nice
reviews.reviewText: Actually nice quality curtains. Heavy, fabric is nice and not cheap looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these. They do look like nice, fairly thick fabric curtain panels however, they do not block 100% of the light. They definitely cut it down, but definitely not black out curtains. The first photo was taken at Sunset so it wasn’t very bright out and you can see where the window is. I have blinds behind there so if I lower the blinds my room is almost blacked out so that’s not a problem. I kept these because I really like the fabric and the look of them you can see in the second photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these curtains the quality is amazing and the price is unbeatable , my ceiling height is 8ft and I bought 100x96 and it’s perfect will be agin and will recommend to others !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. These look awesome in my dining room. The quality is very nice. These are a little heavy. They would work great for room darkness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning! Exceeded my expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had more windows so I had a reason to buy more of these curtains!It took me a while to finally pick a curtain because they are all so gorgeous, but I finally settled on charcoal. I was looking for some long panels to visually open up the tall frameless window in the bedroom while also blocking light. Our linens/decor is largely in a grey palette, but kind of all over the place as far as tones and hues, some very greenish, some warm, some steely blue. To make matters worse, our furniture is a mishmash of mid-century walnut originals and contemporary laminated particleboard in black, brown and black-brown. So I was really hoping maybe some curtains would coordinate it all. I checked out the charcoal, taupe and grey and was completely unprepared for how terrific they all were. These panels are nice and weighty, but not heavy enough to make my widespread curtain rods droop. (I thought I might have to install a ceiling support, phew!). Although the product photos show the texture of the knit up close, the photos don't do them justice. You really have to see them in a room. There's a slight shimmer to the knit which doesn't at all show up as shiny or metallic, but subtly reflects so many complimentary tones in all different lighting. (You could probably purchase any shade of these H. Versailtex curtains for literally any color decor, and it would miraculously tie the room together.) Also, I never heard of this company before stumbling upon them on here, amazon for the win!PROS:- Definitely "room darkening" and not blackout, which I prefer. We tried blackout curtains and thought they were great until we woke up at 3:30pm and very confused. These block out enough light to sleep in comfortably, but not like an isolation tank.- Pretty, smooth, brown grommets. Antique bronze or whatever, I worried they would clash with my pewter rods, but just like the curtains themselves, they compliment the decor. I also appreciate the clean line- they're not stamped with weird embellishments and so there's no drag and it pulls smoothly without whatever you call that circular maneuver is when you're wrestling a drape that got stuck. (The ability to open and close efficiently is something I look for in a window treatment.)- Quality, straightforward packaging. Vinyl and a zipper go a long way. Nothing screams disappointment like new fancy drapes packaged like something someone forgot to pick up at the dry cleaners.CONS:- Compelled me to write a lengthy review about curtains, which I've never done before and am unsure how I feel about that.I am just a regular amazon shopper who paid full price and would do so again. I just happen to think these are terrific and deserve a strong recommendation:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay for the price
reviews.reviewText: This patio door curtain does block the light and blocks the cold from the glass patio doors. The color was what I expected. However, I couldn't get all the wrinkles steamed out of the material.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice blackout effect and thermal capacity
reviews.reviewText: Same colour on street facing side. Perfect for my husband’s mancave. Washable. Hang to dry I believe
Tal como se ve en la foto, la tela de súper buena calidad , el color maravilloso , el largo de las cortinas Exacto. Están bellísimas y tienen muy buena caída. Lucen muy bien
These look great, they look more expensive then they are. Nice quality and well made. They hang nicely.
